name: One Sandy Worm
description:
It's a sandworm! Move with left+right, eat all the humans.

(Clone of Deepworm, but with a twist)

But how does it fit the theme?

-> The only way to get a happy ending is to fail as a sandworm. 

This is my first game jam, so feedback would be appreciated!

Oh, and I wasn't able to work on it the entire weekend, so it was made in <24 hours.
